statements: DELETE FROM women_rights_conventions WHERE id = 1 AND country = 'USA';
DELETE FROM women_rights_conventions WHERE signing_date < '2021-01-01' AND implementation_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM TreatyStatus WHERE ratification_status = 'Not Ratified' AND signatory_country = 'USA';
DELETE FROM Conventions WHERE convention_name = 'Climate Change Convention';
DELETE FROM Treaty_Status WHERE ratification_status = false;
DELETE FROM articles WHERE article_number > 10 AND treaty_id = 3;
DELETE FROM ratifications WHERE country_id = 1 AND date_ratified < '2020-01-01';
